left.name: FIN
left.sql: select 'SY' AS OBJ, MAX (sy.lastdatetime) LASTDATETIME from FIN.SY UNION SELECT 'BR' AS OBJ, MAX (BR.LASTDATETIME) LASTDATETIME FROM FIN.BR UNION SELECT 'CLRBRKACCT' AS OBJ, MAX(ClrBrkrAcct.LastDateTime) LASTDATETIME FROM FIN.ClrBrkrAcct UNION SELECT 'FN' AS OBJ, MAX(FN.LASTDATETIME) LASTDATETIME FROM FIN.FN

right.name: VPM
right.sql: select 'SY' AS OBJ, MAX (sy.lastdatetime) LASTDATETIME from VPM..sy UNION SELECT 'BR' AS OBJ, MAX (BR.LASTDATETIME) LASTDATETIME FROM VPM..BR UNION SELECT 'CLRBRKACCT' AS OBJ, MAX(ClrBrkrAcct.LastDateTime) LASTDATETIME FROM VPM..ClrBrkrAcct UNION SELECT 'FN' AS OBJ, MAX(FN.LASTDATETIME) LASTDATETIME FROM VPM..FN
